outputs.name: label_text
outputs.description: The text with which each of the faces or sub-faces are labeled.

outputs.name: base_pts
outputs.description: The base point for each of the text labels.

outputs.name: labels
outputs.description: The text objects that are displaying within the Rhino scene.

outputs.name: wire_frame
outputs.description:
A list of curves representing the outlines of the faces or
sub-faces. This is useful for understanding which geometry elements
each label corresponds to.

inputs.name: _hb_objs
inputs.description:
Honeybee Faces, Rooms or a Model to be labeled with their attributes
in the Rhino scene.

inputs.name: _attribute_
inputs.description:
Text for the name of the attribute with which the faces or
sub-faces should be labeled. The Honeybee "Face Attributes" component
lists all of the core attributes of the room. Also, each Honeybee
extension (ie. Radiance, Energy) includes its own component that lists
the face and sub-face attributes of that extension. Default: "name".

inputs.name: sub_faces_
inputs.description: Set to "True" to have the component label the window surfaces in the model instead of the opaque surfaces.  By default, this is set to "False" to label just the opaque surfaces.

inputs.name: _txt_height_
inputs.description:
An optional number for the height of the text in the Rhino
scene.  The default is auto-calculated based on the dimensions of the
input geometry.

inputs.name: _font_
inputs.description:
An optional name of a font in which the labels will display. This
must be a font that is installed on this machine in order to work
correctly. Default: "Arial".

name: HB Label Faces
description:
Lablel Honeybee faces and sub-faces with their attributes in the Rhino scene.
_
This can be used as a means to check that correct properties are assigned to
different faces and sub-faces.
-
